name: The Temple (SuBiScript2)
description:
Action / shooting / exploration 2D game inspired by the Lovecraft’s icon universe and based on a storybook called The Temple. You will control a submarine’s commander called Müller during the second war world that will try to escape from a sinking temple found under the North Atlantic waters but something seems to follow him.

  • An immersive adventure that invites you to discover a dark and mysterious place.
  • Müller can use a shield protection to avoid enemies approach and attacks.
  • Lighting has multitude changes depending on Müller’s actions.
  • Cultural reference through a known and famous universe icon such a Lovecraft.

Note: This project has been part of a university delivery created in 10 weeks, the time duration of the game is about 10 minutes. Please enjoy! =)

Youtube Teaser: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GY_OpafnNc8
